titles.title: Have You Heard The Good News?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Have you heard the good news? Sisters: Good news, good news. Have you heard the good news? Good news, good news. Have you heard the good news? Good news, good news.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Death died in Jesus Christ! Death died in Jesus Christ!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God’s life passed out of death! God’s life passed out of death!{/lang-eng}
